Contrast Centers Stretch.

In 2007 this is the current favorite for algorithms, scales values between -1 and 1.

a - Value (usually summarized intensity) from A allele.

void loadSNPHints ( std::string  fileName,
std::vector< std::string > &  colNames,
std::map< std::string, std::vector< affx::GType > > &  knownCalls 
)

Read in the precomputed genotypes from a tab delimited file.

Must be a column for each Celfile with same header name as celfile and an row for every snp to be analyzed. There can be extra columns and order of columns is not important as the resulting order will be the same as the colNames vector. Steal from GenoSeedTxt.

Parameters:
fileName - text file containing the known genotype calls colNames - the name of samples. knownCalls -- the map that store knownCalls infomation for each SNP.

Definition at line 438 of file GenoUtility.cpp.

std::vector< float > &  sketch 
)

Open and read a target distribution from a text file.

Must have a column called 'intensities' with distribution quantiles sorted from highest to lowest.

Parameters:
fileName - text file containing column of quantiles. sketch - vector that stores the sketch.
